title: Windows update and league Crashing
body:
Hello, 

Since the last windows update. My game loads in and then freezes my entire computer.  is anyone else having this problem with League?

replies.body: Some players have been having freezing and buzzing sound issues after a recent Windows 10 update.  It looks like the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabled and has been causing issues with League.  Disabling it should get this fixed and have you back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions!
